ygData.subject: Re: Cybertronian Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at the bot with a surpized look on her face. You mean you weren t sent to kill me? Oh well in that case, since I have a choice, I ll choose not

::Battera::

She looked at the bot with a surpized look on her face. "You mean you 
weren't sent to kill me? Oh well in that case, since I have a choice, 
I'll choose not to be killed."
She felt foolish over this. She rested her head in her hand. This did 
not make things easier in the talks for peace.
She looked up at the bot. "I'm Battera. How are you. And who are you?"
She still kept her eyes on the cannon.  She was starting to trust 
Rex. But she had just met this one.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm/Rex::
> 
> Firearm blinks, looking at Battera. "Um...."
> 
> This was one strange Predacon, most Predacons ussually didn't want 
to be 
> killed. But where did she get the idea that he was going to kill 
her?
> 
> Firearm activates his comm-link. "Um, Rex," he says into 
it, "There's a 
> Predacon female here that wants me to kill her. What do I do?"
> 
> "If you kill her," Rex's voice replies, "I'll scrap you and turn 
you into a 
> food proccessor."
> 
> Firearm blinks again. This was confusing him, but he was easily 
confused. He 
> looks at Battera. "Rex doesn't want me to kill you. Do you want to 
be killed?"
